results.title: Building an organisation
results.creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Barrie Howells, John Kemeny and Bonnie Sherr Klein
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Challenge for change/Societe nouvelle”.
In this film we witness obstacles encountered by a new community action organization in Buffalo, New York, as it begins to work for recognition. Award: Columbus

results.creator_credit: Healthsharing Women. Publishing and Production Group and Bob Scarfe

results.title: Building an african village
results.brief_description: A short program which outlines a Community Aid Abroad project. Victorian school children learn from a group of visiting Africans the skills of mud brick building. Designed to promote positive images of Africa and its people.

results.title: Building a nation: Israel
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Earth and it’s peoples”.
Changes in the cultures of the earth’s peoples are being brought about today with the advent of modern technologies. Israel, the seat of an ancient culture, illustrates such change. In this semi-arid land irrigation has been a foremost problem. Old methods of subsistence farming with antiquated tools and inadequate irrigation are giving way to modern settlements where irrigation and mechanized farming produce excellent crops. Old cities in which religious influence once predominated are contrasted with modern cities, the major activities of which are the development of trade and industry. Immigrants arriving in Israel today live in cooperative settlements and work on farm lands that have been reclaimed from the desert by modern irrigation.

results.title: Building a highway
results.brief_description: A survey of the role of highways in America’s system of transportation and the major processes of roadbuilding including: first surveying, cutting, scraping and levelling of the roadbed; assembling materials; mixing and dumping concrete; smoothing and finishing surface; necessary skills involved to ensure safe, well-built highways.

results.title: Building a bridge: Tajik
results.creator_credit: International Film Foundation, Julien Bryan and Hermann Schlenker
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Mountain peoples of Central Asia”.
Shows how, in three days of actual construction, one hundred Tajik men and boys from one village work together to rebuild their hand-construction bridge. No narration.
